oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Ron Hellard - 2007-06-23
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum's Ford Theater. June 23, 2007
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ron Hellard
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Performances include "Can I Get An Amen" -- "While The Telephone Rings" -- "Velvet Chains" -- "I Am A Country Song" -- "If There Hadn't Been You" -- "Radio Lover" -- "Rock On" -- "Rock N Roll Money" -- "I Tell It Like It Used To Be" -- "I'm No Stranger To The Rain" -- "Quittin' Time"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hellard, Ron; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
